channel.title: Help me!
channel.description: hi this is my first script since i abbandoned my first one ( powercutter too hard) so if there is any way to make this any better or to add something like forms please tell me.. thanks

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Crazy_Cat Crazy Cat
item.description:
@Crazy_Cat wrote:

I think(think is the key word I am still a noob) that this code would be LESS detecable.

[code]//autologin + drop by jason aka sonny bill 9
//setup
//drag cross hair onto rs screen
//press play
//login and drop
program autodrop;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
const
username =‘bots 4 scar’; //add your username
password =‘tester’; //add your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemousesmooth(468, 291)
wait(1000);
holdmouse(468, 291,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(468, 291,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(username,400,100)
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(373, 274)
wait(1000);
holdmouse(373, 247,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(373, 247,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(password,400,100)
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(331, 320)
wait(1000);
holdmouse(331, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(331, 320,true)
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(398, 344);
wait(7000);
holdmouse(398, 344,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(398, 344,true)
wait(3000)
end;

procedure drop;
begin
gametab(4);
status(‘Dropping’);
if (invfull = true) then
mousespeed:=1;
dropto(1,28);
wait(2000+random(550));
terminatescript
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
login;
drop;
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I’m leaving for six Flags right now, but I’ll give you some feedback later tonight.

for now I can say, try to stay away from move and clickmouse. Try to aim more at Mouse and MMouse procedures.
that is all. BAI

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @da_boom_king da_boom_king
item.description:
@da_boom_king wrote:

Don’t worry about putting complicated stuff in your first script. Although I’m a noob to SRL and Scar I can say that this applys to anything. Take it one step at a time. So next time you can do something a bit more complex but fore now your script looks good.

Read full topic
